known_issues: Sidebar not visible in Version 19 dashboard despite being implemented

existing_features.title: Ensure the DashboardLayout sidebar is visible and properly rendered on the left side of the screen with Deep Onyx (#050505) background and Emerald (#10b981) accent colors
Verify sidebar is not hidden by CSS display, visibility, opacity, z-index, or overflow properties in DashboardLayout component and parent containers
Check responsive behavior to ensure sidebar is not collapsed or hidden on the current viewport size being used

new_feature_requests.summary: Fix sidebar visibility issue - sidebar not appearing in dashboard
